name: Legendary Curling Championship
description:
Enjoy a game of curling with a friend. 

How To Play

1. To Throw: Click, drag and release the stone in the direction of the target.

2. Once released tap the arrow (or WASD) keys to sweep the stone forward, backward, left and right. The faster you tap the arrow keys the more the throw direction is affected.

Tip: Curling requires a light touch to throw a good shot, but if you overthrow you can always tap the down arrow (or S key) repeatedly to slow your shot down.

Currently, this game only supports local 2-player mode. 1-player modes are in development.

This game is best played with a keyboard and mouse, but a trackpad is also suitable.

If you run into any unexpected issues or enjoyed playing please leave a comment. Thanks for playing.
